column4: hey ppl i have a problem installing ubuntu 10.04 netbook dual with win7 starter. when i boot from my diskonkey ubuntu install in the menu of the install there is no side by side install option like it shown on the tutorial
it doesnt work that way, first you have to have free space, do you have free space
what I mean by "free" space is not "available" hard drive space, I mean hard drive space not being used by windows 7
yes i used win 7 partition tool to shrink the c drive and now i have 50 g of space not used
yes i used win 7 partition tool to shrink the c drive and now i have 50 g of space not used
you have to ask in the room whether it's ok or not to PM, you dont just send a PM
